result.reason: Issue lacks detail on protocol (RDP/VNC), whether clipboard and drive redirection are enabled in connection settings, and whether the failure is for text or files — RDP file copy requires both RedirectClipboard and RedirectDrives to be enabled.
result.approach: Ask reporter to confirm protocol, enable RedirectClipboard + RedirectDrives in connection properties, and share exact mRemoteNG version; if redirection settings are correctly enabled but copy-paste still fails, investigate RDP session options passed to MSTSCLib ActiveX control.
